@ mwalsher:
Yes, I wrote it personally using Inno Setup. This is a simplified type of installer that avoids microsoft's complicated and slow "Windows Installer" and doesn not check windows version or anyting. All it does is copy the files to the designated install location and add the essential registry entries to enable the game to run. To confirm this, all you have to do is open the source code of the installer itself (included in the torrent), so you can see for yourself that this is not bogus stuff and only does what I told you.
